p: The SPFP-MSCs were assayed for cell immunophenotype surface protein expression and SPFP-MSCs must express CD29, CD73 and CD105, and lack expression of hematopoietic linage markers CD45, CD34 according to a previously published articles [ 42, 43, 44] by flow cytometry (FACSverse™, Beckman Coulter Inc., Brea, CA, USA). The 10 μL of cell suspension with density at 5 × 10 6 cells was diluted into 200 μL of PBS and centrifuged at 900× g for 3 min. Then, the cell supernatant was discarded, added with 1 μL of antibody, and mixed by vortex. Cells were incubated for 30 min at 4 °C in the dark at room temperature. Then, cells were fixed by addition of 50 μL 4% paraformaldehyde in PBS for 15 min in the dark at room temperature and centrifuged at 900× g for 3 min. The supernatant was discarded and resuspended in 0.3 mL of PBS for FACS analysis. As a negative control, cell suspension without antibody was employed following the same procedure.
